title: Beautiful and Renovated Two Bedroom! ONE MONTH FREE!
posting_body: ['St. Clair', '5450 S Fort Apache Rd, Las Vegas, NV, 89148', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 116', 'OR Text', '116', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Welcome to this Community', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1292 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Where style meets comfort and space meets taste!', 'Conveniently located off the 215 and South Russell Road our community features one of the largest floor plans in the area while also featuring one of the smallest communities in the area.', 'With only 187 gated all corner units we are sure to meet your every customized need.', 'Come live with us in our most open floor plans.', 'Get to know our area even further by exploring the neighborhood with nearby shopping centers and parks all within walking distance!', 'Come enjoy traditional living with St. Clair, You’re invited to be our long term Guests.', 'Features', '- Vertical Blinds', '- all units come with breakfast bar and open kitchen to living room', '- Gated', '- large garden tub.', 'master bedroom in the two bedrooms has linen cubicle.1x1 have additional storage space', '- open concept living room', '- Pantry', '- Ample Cabinet Space', '- walk in closets come with shelving.', 'Master bedrooms accommodate king size furniture', '- Ice Maker', '- Track Lighting', '- Panoramic Windows', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Central AC', 'Community Amenities', '- Wi-Fi Access in Clubhouse, Pool, and Fitness Center', '- Fitness Center', '- Large Fire Pit', '- Beautifully Manicured Landscaping', '- BBQ Areas', '- Large Pool', '- Business Center', '- Spa', '- Onsite and On-call Maintenance', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Breed / Size Restricted- 35lbs.', '$400 Fee/ $40 Pet Rent', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'Jb8dyMg4']
